title: Since MacOS 26.0.1, firefox freezes on resuming from sleep
content:
As per the topic, since the MacOS 26.0.1 update Firefox freezes after resuming from sleep. Specifically, tab selection, page refreshes or menu selections cannot occur. Keyboard command to quit does work and after a reload all tabs, windows and function is restored

None of my extensions have changed and for the first week or so after the initial MacOS 26 release this issue wasn't occurring. No other application or system changes have occurred since 26.0.1.

title: Firefox 143.0.3 is  a terrible, jacked-up mess!!!
content: I was updated to 143.0.4 a couple of days ago. Ever since, I've had all kinds of issues. Some sites won't load properly. Some links are not clickable. We're talking sites I use all the time and have never seen this happen before. I have not changed anything in my firewall or antivirus and have used them for years with Firefox. I refreshed and nothing. I actually uninstalled Firefox, cleaned out the registry entries, and installed 143.0.3 today. And yes, I did set it to not auto-update. Still misbehaving. I don't know if I missed a reg key that might be the culprit. I'm currently using Chrome Canary - although it's not my favorite, it is working normally on the same sites I've tried with Firefox. I even opened Edge for the first time in ages - it's working fine as well! I love Firefox, but I don't know what to do at this point! Please, can you help?

title: dark reader is bugged
content:
Dark reader stopped working so I downloaded it again, but then the owner demanded payment, I paid, got a "key" but there is NO PLACE TO "ACTIVATE" IT! https://darkreader.org/tips/activation/ 

I discovered that "dark reader" disabled ALL dark themes including Windows accessibility dark theme also made it IMPOSSIBLE to install or activate any other software or products, he messed up my machine big time!

The work around I resorted to has problems, many links on pages are not visible & now I also can't access my account, I can't log in. I have macular degeneration, my vision is terrible, being a touch typist helps but not with my vision. WERE CAN I "ACTIVATE" THAT *(&%#!! KEY??
